item.title: Kremlin aide praises Trump's 'peace efforts' after Zelenskyy meeting, Putin call
item.description: Kremlin envoy Kirill Dmitriev praised U.S. President Donald Trump's "peace efforts" after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy traveled to the Whit...

item.title: WATCH: Scary truck-SUV collision caught on camera
item.description: Dashcam footage shows the moment an SUV crashed into the back end of an oncoming 18-wheeler. Fortunately, no serious injuries were reported.

item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Netanyahu to meet Trump at Mar-a-Lago on Monday
item.description: Sporadic clashes between the Israel Defense Forces and Gaza militants -- plus deadly IDF strikes -- continue despite the Gaza ceasefire.

item.title: Families of Bondi Beach victims demand more federal action
item.description: Families of victims of the recent Sydney massacre are urging more federal action to investigate rising antisemitism and security failures

item.title: WATCH: 2 men spotted walking dangerously close to Kilauea volcano
item.description: In the video captured on Dec. 23, one man can be seen gesturing to the webcam operated by the U.S. Geological Survey.
